about: Dashes sideways while firing multiple arrows
Charges up an shot from his bow and fires
Large frontal cone that fires multiple arrows several times, firing in varied patterns
Performs a melee attack twice, then jumps backwards and fires multiple lines of arrows at the ground
Goes airborne and fires an arrow straight down, which split into eight projectiles that travel across the ground
Disappears and fires multiple mirror arrows
While not moving, you will receive a stacking Crippling Vines debuff which slows movement speed
